        The checkForCollisions method.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a boolean that indicates if there is a collision or not.

      • checkForStoneToMove

        public boolean checkForStoneToMove(Entity[][] entity,
                                   int x,
                                   int y,
                                   int sideX)
        The checkForStoneToMove method.
        Parameters:
        entity - the avatar
        x - the avatar's x
        y - the avatar's y
        sideX - the side on which the player wants to move the stone (left/right)
        Returns:
        a boolean that indicates if the player can move a stone on the side he wants.
